alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 11:59AM MST until February 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Little Belt and Highwood Mountains, Cascade County below 5000ft and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains
